Title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Pulse follow-ups for Glint surveys
Description:
Empower managers and leaders to gather additional context and check in on team progress after an org-wide Glint survey by sending a personalized Pulse that uses M365 Copilot to tailor the Pulse to the team's needs based on the Glint survey results.
